</xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="11"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="proofOfIdentityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>One or two digit code that represents a type of a proof of identity, the up to date list of values can be found in the Service Specification document</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="proofOfAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>One or two digit code that represents a type of a proof of address, the up to date list of values can be found in the Service Specification document</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="proofOfIdentityReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Serial number that idintifies uniquely the Identity proof</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="jobTitleType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Job Title of company contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="jobFunctionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Job Function of company contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="companyRegistrationNoType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For SMEs, the Company Registration Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="companyPhoneNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>For SMEs, the MSISDN or phone number of the Company</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="13"/> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="typeYes"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Used in xsd:choice to indicate one among the choice should be selected ex. in a choice of Standard Delivery Option and Chargeable Delivery Option this type can used for Standard Delivery Option</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="orderPlacedByPartyReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier for customer details as assigned by the requester.. This is used to allow the same customer details to be associated with multiple products without having to repeat the cutsomer details</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="legalEntityPartyReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier for customer details as generated by the requester. This is used to allow the same customer details to be associated with multiple products without having to repeat the cutsomer details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="creditCheckStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Status code is a number varying from 1 to 99, the up to date list of values can be found in the service specification document</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="creditVetNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the internal Id used by the credit bureau to track the application, Mandatory If credit Vet was done</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,11}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="depositKindType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of deposit SERVICE Deposit for basic phone service/handset VAS Deposit for Value Added Services such as International Roaming</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="VAS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SERVICE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ESMEBOND"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="depositReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The reference number for the deposit generated by the entity where the deposit was billed</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="creditScoreType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The creditVet Score returned from the Credit Bureau</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="-?\d{1,6}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="referralReasonType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The reason that the credit check was referred. Mandatory if creditCheckStatus is "REFERRED". Possible values VETTING_REFERRED: The credit checking agency returned a status of 'Refer' and Back Office checking is required. DEPOSIT_MORE_DETAILS_REQ</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VETTING_REFERRED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DEPOSIT_MORE_DETAILS_REQ"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="creditCheckResultCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Single uppercased Letter identifying the Credit Decision returned by Transact A - Accept D - Declined E - Error R - Refer Z - Additional Information Required C - Continue</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="A"/> <xsd:enumeration value="D"/> <xsd:enumeration value="E"/> <xsd:enumeration value="R"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Z"/> <xsd:enumeration value="C"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="totalMonthlyChargeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total Monthly Charge for the Given Order</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,14}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="creditLimitType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>maximum amount of credit that allowed for the current order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,14}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ruleValidateCheckType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The result of the validation Rules 0 - PASS 1 - FAIL 2 - REFER 3 - NOT DONE</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:enumeration value="0"/> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ruleValidationStringType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>String containing the result of the Rule validation. In the formatXXXXXXXX where X 0, 1 or 2 for PASS, FAILED or REFER as above</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[0123]{9}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="outcomeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SUCCESSFUL/FAILURE</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESSFUL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FAILURE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="addressValidationStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The status of the address check performed by Equifax or Capscan. Only applied to a customer address not the delivery address. Valid values are: 0 - EQUIFAX. Verified using Equifax address search 1 - BROKEN. Address validation could not be performed for technical reasons 2 - PROOF. Customer has provided proof of address documentation 3 - NONE. Address not validated 4 - CAPSCAN. Verified using CapScan address search. Only applied to a customer address not the delivery address. External systems will hold the textual descriptions for these codes locally.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:short"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="callTypeIndicatorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>It takes the following values, OUTBOUND = pro-active or INBOUND = reactive order This is used for commisions/retention.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="INBOUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OUTBOUND"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="portalRegistationIdDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The portal details, such as portal name and portal domain.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="portalUserId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="portalDomain" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="storeNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Store Name like Slough - Curzon Mall</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="storeNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>four character Store Identifier like 0001</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="4"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{4}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CCANumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The External Consumer Credit Agreement Number.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="serviceIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A sequential integer to represent one service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="hardwareRRPType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This the original cost of the hardware item before any discounts and down payments in pence</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="hardwareDescriptionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the hardware associated with the CCA</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CCATermType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The term of the Consumer Credit Agreement in months.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="instalmentAmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the amount of money in pence that is to be paid each month.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="mandateType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of mandate e.g. Credit Card - 14 days, Direct Debit - 14 days.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="mandateReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of mandate e.g. Credit Card - 14 days, Direct Debit - 14 days.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="mandateStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The state the mandate is in e.g. Expired, Pending, Active, Used, One-Time.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="40"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="branchName"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Branch of the financial institution were the customer is registered.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="cardIssuer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Numeric Value Maps to 0 - Maestro 1 - Solo 2 - Visa 3 - Mastercard 4 - Delta 5 - AMEX 16 - Electron</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="userBankAccountNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The customer name defined on the Bank Account.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="255"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="userBankSortCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Bank Account sort code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="8"/> <xsd:maxLength value="9"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="treatmentStatus"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The treatment status</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INTREATMENT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTINTREATMENT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="orderCreditCheckStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Status code is a number varying from 1 to 99, the up to date list of values can be found in the service specification document</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="\d{1,2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="treatmentActionCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The treatment code that is stored in geneva. This is relates to the debt escalation attribute of the account. For example 3114 Service Deny (CON10A)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="discountAmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The discount given to hardware based on the airtime choosen. In pence e.g. 20GBP equals 2000</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="downPaymentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount of money in pence that will be paid upfront for the hardware in pence</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="totalCreditType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount of money in pence that will be provided in credit. e.g. 20GBP equals 2000</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="CCAFileDetailsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Details of a file</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fileContent" type="cpd:fileContentType"/> <xsd:element name="fileType" type="cpd:fileType"/> <xsd:element name="fileName" type="cpd:fileNameType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="fileContentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The content of the file</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:base64Binary"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="fileNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the file</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="fileType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of file e.g. PDF</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CCAStatusType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The status of the CCA.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="finalPaymentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount of money in pence that will be paid upfront for the hardware in pence</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="discretionaryDiscountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is a discretionary discount given at the time of purchase.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="cardReferencePaymentIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reference payment identifier which uniquely identifies the payment made by the card</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="externalPaymentIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>External payment identifier used for providing refunds</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="cancellationAmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The amount paid, in pence, when the CCA was cancelled.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="settlementAmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the full amount of money in pence that needs to be paid to discharge the loan.
